title: Hour 2: QB Rankings
description:
Keyshawn Johnson, Ryan Clark, and Kendrick Perkins discuss if they believe that the Nets can bring back both Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant. The crew reacts to the top 10 NFL QBs according to a survey of NFL executives, coaches, scouts, and players. Keyshawn and Kendrick debate if the Lakers are in danger of taking a back seat to the Clippers in Los Angeles.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Who are the NFL's top ranked QBs?
